text: Michel Stolker (29 September 1933 - 28 May 2018) was a Dutch former professional racing cyclist. He rode in three editions of the Tour de France. He was born in Utrecht, Netherlands. Stolker died on 28 May 2018 in Etten Leur at the age of 84. ==References== Category:1933 births Category:2018 Category:Deaths from hypertension Category:Dutch cyclists Category:Sportspeople from Utrecht (city)
title: Michel Stolker
